body:
> Any idea as to why Taskcluster is failing on this? Locally, the addon tests pass fine, and looking at (what I think are) the logs, I don't really see any errors indicating the problem.

I think our TC builds in general might be busted, but the errors aren't consistent; I've seen three separate types of failures in the last 24 hours.
body_text:
Any idea as to why Taskcluster is failing on this? Locally, the addon tests pass fine, and looking at (what I think are) the logs, I don't really see any errors indicating the problem.

I think our TC builds in general might be busted, but the errors aren't consistent; I've seen three separate types of failures in the last 24 hours.
body_html:
Any idea as to why Taskcluster is failing on this? Locally, the addon tests pass fine, and looking at (what I think are) the logs, I don't really see any errors indicating the problem.

I think our TC builds in general might be busted, but the errors aren't consistent; I've seen three separate types of failures in the last 24 hours.
